verses.verse: And I saw <S%G3708><s%> another <S%G243><s%> strong <S%G2478><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> coming <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> out of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> with a cloud; <S%G3507><s%> and the rainbow <S%G2463><s%> was upon his head, <S%G2776><s%> and his face <S%G4383><s%> was like <S%G5613><s%> the sun, <S%G2246><s%> and his feet <S%G4228><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> pillars <S%G4769><s%> of fire; <S%G4442><s%>

and he had <S%G2192><s%> in his hand <S%G5495><s%> a little <S%G974><s%> book <S%G974><s%> which was open. <S%G455><s%> And he placed <S%G5087><s%> his right <S%G1188><s%> foot <S%G4228><s%> on the sea <S%G2281><s%> and his left <S%G2176><s%> on the land; <S%G1093><s%>

and he cried <S%G2896><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> as when a lion <S%G3023><s%> roars; <S%G3455><s%> and when <S%G3753><s%> he had cried <S%G2896><s%> out, the seven <S%G2033><s%> peals <S%G1027><s%> of thunder <S%G1027><s%> uttered <S%G2980><s%> their voices. <S%G5456><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> peals <S%G1027><s%> of thunder <S%G1027><s%> had spoken, <S%G2980><s%> I was about <S%G3195><s%> to write; <S%G1125><s%> and I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Seal <S%G4972><s%> up the things which <S%G3739><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> peals <S%G1027><s%> of thunder <S%G1027><s%> have spoken, <S%G2980><s%> and do not write <S%G1125><s%> them."

And the angel <S%G32><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I saw <S%G3708><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> on the sea <S%G2281><s%> and on the land <S%G1093><s%> lifted <S%G142><s%> up his right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%>

and swore <S%G3660><s%> by Him who lives <S%G2198><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever, <S%G165><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and the things in it, and the earth <S%G1093><s%> and the things in it, and the sea <S%G2281><s%> and the things in it, that there shall be delay <S%G5550><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> longer, <S%G3765><s%>

but in the days <S%G2250><s%> of the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he is about <S%G3195><s%> to sound, <S%G4537><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is finished, <S%G5055><s%> as He preached <S%G2097><s%> to His servants <S%G1401><s%> the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>

And the voice <S%G5456><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> [I heard] again <S%G3825><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> with me, and saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Go, <S%G5217><s%> take <S%G2983><s%> the book <S%G975><s%> which is open <S%G455><s%> in the hand <S%G5495><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%> who stands <S%G2476><s%> on the sea <S%G2281><s%> and on the land. <S%G1093><s%>"

And I went <S%G565><s%> to the angel, <S%G32><s%> telling <S%G3004><s%> him to give <S%G1325><s%> me the little <S%G974><s%> book. <S%G974><s%> And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, "Take <S%G2983><s%> it, and eat <S%G2719><s%> it; and it will make <S%G4087><s%> your stomach <S%G2836><s%> bitter, <S%G4087><s%> but in your mouth <S%G4750><s%> it will be sweet <S%G1099><s%> as honey. <S%G3192><s%>"

And I took <S%G2983><s%> the little <S%G974><s%> book <S%G974><s%> out of the angel's hand <S%G5495><s%> and ate <S%G2719><s%> it, and it was in my mouth <S%G4750><s%> sweet <S%G1099><s%> as honey; <S%G3192><s%> and when <S%G3753><s%> I had eaten <S%G2068><s%> it, my stomach <S%G2836><s%> was made <S%G4087><s%> bitter. <S%G4087><s%>

And they said <S%G3004><s%> to me, "You must <S%G1163><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> concerning <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> peoples <S%G2992><s%> and nations <S%G1484><s%> and tongues <S%G1100><s%> and kings. <S%G935><s%>"
